A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’ve seen the movie twice and I’m so happy that I gave it a second chance. Like many on here i was disappointed the first time I saw it. I didn’t think it was a bad movie just was hoping it would of gone in a different direction. I you feel this way see it a second time. You really can appreciate that the movie itself was actually quite good and the couple scenes that bothered me the first time( everything with Rose\, Leia floating thru space) were overshadowed by all the other good parts of the movie. I plan on going again.
